Miaoting Mei

Home letter map

_________________ 75 ___ _ Home Letter Map is an interactive visual novel about memory, migration, and cultural identity. Inspired by Taishan�s overseas Chinese heritage, it guides players through meaningful hometown sites�train stations, courtyards, food stalls�blending storytelling and reflection. Aimed at second-generation migrants and young workers away from home, the game reimagines family letters as a digital experience, inviting players to reconnect with their roots and explore what �home� truly means.
